title: Event booking at Thomas and Mack Center

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Contracts or agreements for a submission grappling event at the Thomas and Mack Center on Aug. 16 and 17, 2024
- The name and address of the company that reserved the Thomas and Mack Center on Aug. 16 and 17, 2024

The event is called the Craig Jones Invitational and is described here: https://jitsmagazine.com/dates-and-location-announced-for-inaugural-craig-jones-invitational/

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris Amico

title: (FOIA) Stokeley Clevon Goulbourne (Ski Mask the Slump God)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All records related to Stokeley Clevon Goulbourne (known professionally as Ski Mask the Slump God), Date of Birth: 18 April, 1996, within your agency's possession from 2010 to present day.

We had a previous request that was rejected for payment not being received in 10 days. The record number was Reference #: R384421-050724 and would request the same documents that were enclosed within that report.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Demarcus Nottington
